FuncDef: This command sets the backup destination IPv4 address of GRE encapsulated packets associated with a particular GRE tunnel. If the primary destination address is not reachable in the delivery service (there is no route) or not defined then this is the destination IPv4 address of GRE encapsulated packets sent by the delivery service.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the destination IPv4 address of the GRE tunnel. Values-1.0.0.0 to 223.255.255.255.
